unittitle_ssm: A. Cooke Hull election petition and memorial book
abstract_ssm: This collection contains a petition endorsing A. Cooke Hull as a candidate for alderman of Brooklyn's Third Ward, dated 1865, and a memorial book for Hull, presented on July 7, 1868 by the Board of Education of the City of Brooklyn.
